ingredients: 1 cup (dry) red lentils, soaked, rinsed, and drained
2 medium eggplants, washed, dried, and pricked a few times with a fork
1 large onion, diced (or sliced or howe’er you want)
2 cans of no-salt added fire-roasted diced tomatoes (or 2 large fresh tomatoes, diced)
a few (or 8, if you’re me) dried red chilies, ground in a coffee grinder (‘cuz you fancy)
